summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1317, for the improvement of East Spring Street, from Twenty-fifth Avenue to Thirty-second Avenue; Twenty-sixth Avenue, from the south line of Buckius' Addition to the City of Seattle to East Union Street; certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, with all necessary curbs, gutters and crosswalks, catch basins etc., under Ordinance No. 14963 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
